title: Time Mends: Timber Wolves
description: After a tragic accident leaves her battered, heartbroken, and alone, Scout Donovan would rather hide in dreams than face reality. But things are changing quickly in Scout's life. Soon she's pulled back into the world of Shifters and Seers, with her best friend's fate depending on Scout's ability to protect her. Can Scout pull it together in time to save Talley, or is the past too much to overcome? Praise for Destiny Binds "Really fantastic." -Ann Aguirre, National Best-Selling Author "Well-written, entertaining and somewhat addictive." -Samantha Young, Amazon Best-Selling Author
author: Tammy Blackwell
